data.event: First settled in 1858, it was named after brothers Alexander and William Kinkead from Maryland.
The village of Alexandria was incorporated February 20, 1877.
Its city charter was adopted in 1908, and it was incorporated as a city in 1909.

event.title: was incorporated as a city in 1909

data.event: Its city charter was adopted in 1908, and it was incorporated as a city in 1909.
He purchased the townsite in 1868 and established a mill, hotel, newspaper, and store.
In 2013, Alexandria was picked as a "Top 10 Best Small Town" by the Livability website.

event.title: offers post-secondary education from certificates on up to 2 year

data.event: Alexandria Technical & Community College offers post-secondary education from certificates on up to 2 year associate degrees.
